Articles.Content:
maybe they are waiting for 1000 pages before release?

or we calm down to release it on low pics connexion!

> 
> Yes it did

Brilliant! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Could you put that in spoilers?
TLDR, before I would read it there would be another 20 pages ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> i had virtually no rehearsal for that.

whyyyyyy????

So it has come to this...

Beethoven's seventh, fourth movement.
There's a wall of text a few pages back. I know because it's also the current page.

Hold your ground, hold your ground! Sons of KSP Forums, of Steam, my brothers! I see in your eyes the same fear that would take the heart of me. A day may come when the courage of kerbals fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day. An hour of wolves and shattered shields, when the age of kerbals comes crashing down! But it is not this day! This day we fight! By all that you hold dear on this good Kerbin, I bid you \*stand, Kerbals of the West!\*

> 
> whyyyyyy????

bee movie

> 
> Station: "Give the panel a tap with your pen to see if it goes off."

The correct method is actually to rotate it counter-clockwise a quarter turn. It only comes on to indicate that someone screwed it in too tightly. It otherwise has no purpose, ignore it~
HARVESTER IS BACK ONLINE! and guys... HE'S CREATING CONTENT GEEEEEEEEEET HYYYYYYYPE
<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-lxlQITXBAQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> Hold your ground, hold your ground! Sons of KSP Forums, of Steam, my brothers! I see in your eyes the same fear that would take the heart of me. A day may come when the courage of men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day. An hour of wolves and shattered shields, when the age of kerbals comes crashing down! But it is not this day! This day we fight! By all that you hold dear on this good Kerbin, I bid you \*stand, Kerbals of the West!\*

The hype to text amount if off balance here.

MORE HYPE.

> 
> There's a wall of text a few pages back. I know because it's also the current page.

The said wall of text starts awesome and will be read once the hype is over!
Kasper and RoverDude are both in the KSPTV twitch channel right now, I'm going to say "soonTM"

> 
> Hold your ground, hold your ground! Sons of KSP Forums, of Steam, my brothers! I see in your eyes the same fear that would take the heart of me. A day may come when the courage of men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day. An hour of wolves and shattered shields, when the age of kerbals comes crashing down! But it is not this day! This day we fight! By all that you hold dear on this good Kerbin, I bid you \*stand, Kerbals of the West!\*

Aragorn joins the HypeTrain?

> 
> 

Whoa, that's quite a read there!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T15:36:42Z" title="04/27/2015 03:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Red Iron Crown**
  
No walls of text, please.
Wall of text ...? How long did it take you to type that?
Did the postal service loose KSP 1.0? Where is it?

> 
> HARVESTER IS BACK ONLINE! and guys... HE'S CREATING CONTENT GEEEEEEEEEET HYYYYYYYPE

Which ofc only can mean the game is released in the next 2 minutes so HYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYPE
I can't take it anymore! RELEASE THE KRAKEN, RELEASE THE KRAKEN!
We must break terminal velocity of all gravity!
HYpe Hype HIUEIHPIAUEyP
Get ready to slam on the brakes!1!

> 
> HARVESTER IS BACK ONLINE! and guys... HE'S CREATING CONTENT GEEEEEEEEEET HYYYYYYYPE

Is this it?
